overview: Fifteen years after the Virgin Lady was imprisoned in Huashan, Agarwood grew into an ordinary noisy man in the city. He was called a brother to the beggar Hanuman. He accidentally rescued Yingluo who came to look for the Baolian lamp, and was not different from the Taoist Taoist who pursued Yingluo. Unfamiliar, set foot on the four beads of “Wisdom, Courage, Benevolence, and Righteousness” to find the Baolian Lantern and rescue the Madonna.
title: Lotus Lantern
